title: Getting down to earth
creator_credit: Wine Advisory Board, William Bronson, Richard Reinhardt and Denver Sutton
brief_description: The goddess Daphne decends to California (with backup help from Bacchus) to help restaurant staff promote and sell more wine with meals. Emphasizes effective presentation of wines and the virtues of California wines.
creator_credit_for_label: Wine Advisory Board, William Bronson, Richard Reinhardt and Denver Sutton
